title: 58 in. Steel Root Assassin Shovel Saw
description: The Patented Teeth Do All The Work. The Root Assassin Shovel is designed for clearing out overgrown areas of garden, forest or brush. With the serrated edges on both sides of the shovel and a unique ability to cut the root while digging in and pulling out, the Root Assassin is the perfect tool for clearing out your garden. The engineered bone structure adds amazing strength without adding weight and the sharpened and curved serrated edges cuts roots easily. The unique shape of the serrated teeth located on each side of the shovel are built to withstand the toughest jobs and can be sharpened with a wheel or grinder. The shovel is made of solid structural carbon steel and is overlaid with a sleek silver color powder coat.
